participant_1.background:
I used to go bowling with my parents on weekends.
I am frugal and creative with my wardrobe.
I love to work with my hands and create things.
i am a seventh day adventist.
I want a modern and stylish home that reflects my vibrant personality.

participant_2.background:
I love to volunteer at my local animal shelter to get hands-on experience with animals and learn more about veterinary medicine.
My biggest challenge was when I was in the military and had to be away from my family for long periods of time.
I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic.
I am an adult who exercises every day to keep my heart and lungs healthy.
My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about medicine and dust allergies.

content.text: Hey, I'm looking for someone to go bowling with this weekend. Would you be interested?
Sorry, I'm not really into bowling. I prefer to spend my time outdoors, volunteering at the local animal shelter.
That's cool. I used to volunteer there when I was younger. It's a great place to work.
Yeah, it is. I love getting to know the animals and helping them get adopted.
I hear you. I have a couple of dogs of my own.
Oh, that's great! What kind of dogs?
I have a golden retriever and a black lab.
Aww, they sound adorable!
Thanks, they are. What kind of animals do you work with at the shelter?
I work with a variety of animals, but I mostly work with dogs and cats.
That must be fun. I love animals.
It is. It's a great way to give back to the community.
Do you have any other hobbies besides volunteering?
Yes, I also like to exercise and keep my heart and lungs healthy.
That's great. I try to exercise as much as I can too.
It's important to stay healthy.
Yeah, I agree.
What do you do for a living?
I work as a software engineer.
Oh, that's cool. I've always been interested in computers.
It's a great field. I really enjoy it.
I'm glad.
So, what are you up to this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go to the park with my dogs.
That sounds fun. I might go bowling.
Have fun!
Thanks! You too!
